critique: This document establishes an Enrichment Oversight Committee (EOC) to monitor and coordinate U.S. government efforts related to uranium enrichment, particularly concerning the privatized United States Enrichment Corporation (USEC) and its successor entities. It focuses on the implementation of the HEU Agreement with Russia, restrictions on foreign influence, and the development of U.S. policy on uranium enrichment. The document emphasizes national security and the maintenance of domestic uranium industries.
